mapper.insert: insert into resume_tb(user_id, title, content, enterprise_logo, address, created_at) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{enterpriseLogo}, #{address}, now())
mapper.update: update resume_tb set user_id = #{userId}, title=#{title}, content = #{content}, enterprise_logo = #{enterpriseLogo}, address = #{address} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.title, e.enterprise_name, r.id, r.created_at FROM recruitment_post_tb r JOIN enterprise_tb e ON r.enterprise_id = e.id;
